solution_line_template: Wanda brought {wanda_bread_pieces} pieces of bread, three times the number of treats, so Wanda brought {wanda_bread_pieces}/{wanda_bread_treats_multiplier} = <<{wanda_bread_pieces}/{wanda_bread_treats_multiplier}={wanda_treats}>>{wanda_treats} treats.
Wanda brought half as many treats as Jane, which means Jane brought {wanda_treats}*{jane_treats_multiplier} = <<{wanda_treats}*{jane_treats_multiplier}={jane_treats}>>{jane_treats} treats.
The total number of pieces of bread Jane brought is 75% of the number of treats, which means Jane brought {jane_bread_treats_percent} * {jane_treats} = {jane_bread_pieces} pieces of bread.

Wanda and Jane brought a total of {wanda_treats} treats+{jane_treats} treats+{jane_bread_pieces} pieces of bread + {wanda_bread_pieces} pieces of bread = <<{wanda_treats}+{jane_treats}+{jane_bread_pieces}+{wanda_bread_pieces}={total_items}>>{total_items}
